thread.title: Rowan advertising students learn to throw the perfect pitch (Rowan University)
thread.title_full: Rowan advertising students learn to throw the perfect pitch (Rowan University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Rowan advertising students learn to throw the perfect pitch (Rowan University)
text: ( Source : Rowan University ) Rowan University's Ad Club teamed with the Philly Ad Club Oct. 5 to teach the perfect pitch. And they were all business -no screwballs, fastballs or spitballs in the vicinity. The evening program in Rowan Hall
